tokens.name: Diagnosis
tokens.value: Closed fracture of the left patella (knee cap)

tokens.name: Treatment Provided
tokens.value: Knee immobilized using a cylinder cast; Analgesics administered (Paracetamol + Ibuprofen); Tetanus toxoid administered; Crutches provided for assisted ambulation; No surgical intervention required

tokens.name: Discharge Medications
tokens.value: Paracetamol 500mg - 1 tablet every 6 hours as needed for pain; Ibuprofen 400mg - 1 tablet every 8 hours after food; Calcium + Vitamin D supplement - once daily

tokens.name: Advice on Discharge
tokens.value: Keep the leg elevated as much as possible; Do not remove or wet the cast; Avoid putting weight on the affected leg; Use crutches when ambulating; Ice therapy for 10 minutes, 3 times daily; Return immediately in case of numbness, bluish discoloration, or increasing pain

tokens.name: Follow-Up
tokens.value: Orthopedic review in 2 weeks; X-ray and range of motion evaluation scheduled; Physiotherapy to begin post-recast evaluation
